Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/1/2015, off Charles Bodkin (COL)...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/2015, hitting .444 with 2 HR, 3 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2015, hitting .440 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2015, hitting .435 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...

Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/2015, hitting .483 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...

Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/2015, hitting .550 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Won MVP in 2015, hitting .335 with 43 HR, 115 RBI...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Drove in 7 runs against Cincinnati on 5/30/2017...
